vote.title: To appoint Kelly Scocco, Director, Columbus Department of Public Service, 111 N. Front Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
vote.description:
Title
Â 
To appoint Kelly Scocco, Director, Columbus Department of Public Service, 111 N. Front Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
